choose:  
A. I fly forward.  
B. I descend and turn right.  
C. I fly forward and rotate the camera upward.  
D. I turn left and go up.  
E. I turn right and descend.

To continue exploring or surveying the environment effectively, flying forward and rotating the camera upward would allow for a broader view of the surrounding area, including any distant features or obstacles. This action helps in maintaining a comprehensive understanding of the landscape ahead.
